sense.def:
The structure of something
je način, kako je nekaj narejeno, zgrajeno ali organizirano.

seg.quote: She analysed the structure of its skull in great detail.
The whole structure of the film was rather simplistic.
The class structures of England and America are quite different.

sense.def:
A structure
je nekaj, kar je zgrajeno ali sestavljeno skupaj.

seg.quote: We visited the Children's Palace, a great sprawling structure.

sense.def:
Kadar neki sistem ali dejavnost
has structure
, je dobro organizirana in učinkovita.

seg.quote: She loved the sense of structure, organization and enthusiasm.

sense.def:
To structure something
pomeni razporediti nekaj v urejeno obliko ali sistem.

seg.quote: They structure their communication to meet the needs of the client.
